en.lattes_summary: Dr. Israel C. Ribeiro holds a PhD in Theoretical Physical Chemistry from USP (2025) and a BSc in Chemistry from UFSJ (2020). He is currently a Postdoctoral Researcher at the University of Mons (UMONS), Belgium. He is also the CEO and Founder of Quantum Master Inc. His expertise covers Density Functional Theory (DFT) simulations (VASP, QE), Machine Learning applied to Materials Science, and Perovskite thin films.
en.cv_pro_summary: Computational Chemist and CEO of Quantum Master Inc., with a strong background in Materials Science and Data Analytics. I specialize in bridging the gap between academic research and industrial applications, using DFT simulations and Machine Learning to optimize materials for the semiconductor and mineralogy sectors. I hold an MBA in Data Science and lead consulting projects focused on data-driven innovation.
en.cv_acad_summary: Researcher with a PhD in Theoretical Physical Chemistry and a Postdoc in Materials Chemistry. My research focuses on atomic-scale investigations of Perovskites, metallic passivation, and optoelectronic properties using First-Principles simulations. I possess advanced skills in VASP, Quantum Espresso, Python, and High-Performance Computing (HPC), aiming to design novel materials for energy applications.
